title: Simple spicy sausage stuffing
ingredients: ['170g butter', '2 onions, chopped', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '8 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '450g spicy sausagemeat', '400g plain breadcrumbs', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '125ml white wine']
